title: Arsene Wenger says Arsenal face five months of cup finals if they are to haul in Chelsea
text:

Arsene Wenger admits his Arsenal side are facing five months of cup finals in their bid to reel in Chelsea. 
The Gunners boss, whose men host Burnley tomorrow, admits they have no margin for error as they attempt to capitalise when their rivals make mistakes. 
Wenger said: “For us every game is a cup final. Yes I see it that way as Chelsea is ahead and everyone else is fighting. 
“So it is important first of all to try to make a distance with the teams around you, take advantage of points they could drop and try to get closer to Chelsea. You never know.” 
Chelsea begin this weekend seven points clear of Spurs and Liverpool with Arsenal a point behind. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Arsene Wenger speaks ahead of Burnley match Share this video Watch Next 
Twelve months ago, the Gunners surrendered their leadership of the title race by winning two out of nine from the turn of the year onwards. 
This time around they have recovered from defeats at Everton and Manchester City to win three of their last four. 
Wenger is confident they can continue that run despite coming up against a Burnley side that have won each of their last two games. 
Arsenal were 1-0 winners at Turf Moor in October, courtesy of Laurent Koscielny’s controversial, 90th-minute goal. Koscielny netted the winner when the two sides last met (Photo: AFP/Getty) Read More Mertesacker pens emotional letter to Arsenal fans after extending deal 
Wenger admitted: “It was a game where we were the most lucky as the goal was a dodgy goal. Koscielny touched the ball with his hand. It came off [Alex Oxlade-]Chamberlain. We had good domination but they defended very well. 
“You could see when I came out of the game that they will not go down as they had the spirit and organisation. They have strong points. 
“They accept to leave you the ball. Not many teams do that and keep their focus. They say, ‘Ok from the start of the game you have the ball but we might try to kill you at some stage’. 
“You need a special spirit to do that. Once you are ten years in the premier league the pressure is on you to do more. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
